title: $:/plugins/danielo515/2click2edit
author: Danielo Rodriguez
name: 2click2edit
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/danielo515/TW5-2click2edit">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/danielo515/TW5-2click2edit"/></$button>

<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://danielorodriguez.com/TW5-2click2edit/">{{$:/core/images/home-button}} <$text text="https://danielorodriguez.com/TW5-2click2edit/"/></$button>

This plugin adds the ability to edit tiddlers by double clicking on its body. Just try to edit any tiddler shown here by double clicking on it.

This can be considered a fast solution. It is only to fill the gap until TiddlyWiki adds support for it officially.

这个插件增加了通过双击其条目主体来编辑tiddlers的能力。试着通过双击这里显示的任何tiddler来编辑它。

这可以说是一个快速解决方案。它只是为了在TiddlyWiki正式添加支持之前填补空白。
